ovdesc.p: An archive facility is available to archive data in this file to AM.TSDATA$ARC. This will be based on the date in ARCHIVE table, record 'SC.SEC.ARCHIVAL', field PURGE.DATE. Any information prior to this year will be archived when Adhoc service SC.INT.ARCHIVAL is run.
